        Additionnal on server side:
        in sysctl "vm.swappiness = 1", "vm.max_map_count=262144"
        in elasticsearch.yml "bootstrap.mlockall: true"

        Settings for Elasticsearch client

                                                         String mapping,
                                                         String type,

        Create an index and alias for a collection (if the alias does not exist)
        Parameters:
        collectionName - the name of the collection
        mapping - the mapping as a string
        type - the type of the collection
        tenantId - the tenant on which to create the index
        Returns:
        true if index is successfully created false if not
